attributes.action: Request DUP withdraw confidence and supply agreement from the Conservative party
attributes.additional_details: If the DUP withdraw confidence and supply agreement the Conservatives will no longer have the numbers to govern, this should then force a General Election where you will have the choice to unseat your Remain bias MP.
attributes.background: Theresa May has lost controll of the Government & House of Commons is at stalemate after many MP's misled their constituents over their intentions of honouring the referendum result. Now we are aware of MP's voting intentions on leaving the EU we should be able to decide if they still represent us.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to ask the UK Parliament and Government for a specific action. 

This petition appears to be asking the DUP, not the UK Parliament and Government, to act.
